name: Michael Markman
executiveSummary: Finance and operations transformation executive with 20+ years' experience across private equity, CRO, and enterprise environments. Architect of automation and analytics programs that modernize global finance and operational processes, reduce costs, and improve decision velocity. Proven ability to build and lead global teams, deliver $10M+ annual savings, and align strategy, systems, and reporting for C-suite execution.

experience.title: Partner, Data & Operations Transformation
highlights: Designed and implemented proposal automation platform for an agritech company integrating CRM data, product catalogs, labor tracking, and customer management to reduce cycle time from days to hours.
Built cloud-based operations dashboards enabling real-time KPI monitoring, cash flow analysis, and variance reporting.
Led operational reporting modernization for middle-market PE portfolio company, reducing manual reporting cycles by 80%.

Delivered current-state assessment for private credit firm including organizational structure, reporting workflows, cross-functional dependencies, and data infrastructure to inform transformation roadmap.
Managed delivery teams across PM, data engineering, and visualization to deploy analytics environments for executive clients.

roles.title: VP, Enterprise Data & Analytics
highlights: Built enterprise operations data platform and process mining capabilities improving cycle times in billing, collections, and service delivery.
Embedded automation and analytics into operational planning across global regions.
Delivered governance framework for enterprise data quality and reporting standards reducing reconciliation time by 50%.
Scaled analytics infrastructure reducing ad-hoc requests by 70%.

roles.title: VP, Head of Global Financial Shared Services
highlights: Led 400-person global organization across AP, AR, payroll, T&E, tax, and close operations.
Achieved $10M (40%) annualized savings and 30% headcount reduction while expanding service scope.
Founded Centers of Excellence for Celonis, Tableau, Alteryx, Python, and Power Platform.
Implemented advanced automation eliminating 10,000+ hours annually.
Served as CAO backup for SOX/GAAP compliance and supported M&A due diligence.

roles.title: Global Controller – Q² Solutions (IQVIA/Quest JV)
highlights: Oversaw all global accounting operations and regulatory compliance.
Implemented scalable controls supporting rapid business expansion.
Eliminated $10M+ in parent-company debt enabling record partner distributions.

experience.title: Vice President – Corporate Controller
highlights: Directed all accounting and financial operations for $11B AUM PE firm.
Reduced close cycle from 15 to 5 business days.
Managed consolidations, GAAP compliance, SOX audits, and regulatory reporting.

experience.title: Management Company / FP&A
highlights: Founding team member establishing the consolidated Firm-wide operating plan.
Co-designed SAP financial platform as new global system of record.
Overhauled quarterly close process improving efficiency by 30%.

experience.title: Assurance Advisory Services – Financial Services Office
highlights: Led audit and advisory work for major investment banks and PE firms including Apollo, Merrill Lynch, Bear Stearns, UBS, NAB.
Supported critical merger and liquidation engagements.
